property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (outputValveControl_isPresent && outputValveControl == false) || (outputValveControl_isPresent && outputValveControl == true && fuelLevel >= capacity)

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == false) || (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == true && fuelLevel >= capacity)

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == false) || (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == true && fuelLevel >= capacity)

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == false) || (inputValveControl_isPresent && inputValveControl == true && fuelLevel >= capacity)
